about_the_game:
Project Down is a thrilling open-world survival game set on an island engulfed in chaos and mutations due to a clandestine genetic experiment gone awry by the нии-12 Institute. Players take control of a stranded team member, as part of a 4-person mercenaries squad sent by Hex Corporation to investigate the explosion. After their boat sinks, they attempt to survive during the dangerous hours of the day while discovering the island.



Players find themselves in a vast open world, beckoning them to explore uncharted territories, from dense forests and enemy bases to mysterious bunkers. Along the way, they uncover remnants of the past and abandoned cities, painting a haunting narrative on the canvas of the island. Every corner reveals a piece of the story, unveiling the mysterious aftermath of the explosive experiment at the нии-12 Institute.



As the island's stability crumbles, survivors find themselves contending with two main threats: ruthless gangs that dominate various areas and the mutated beings spawned from the aftermath of the нии-12 explosion. Navigating this perilous terrain demands not only resilience against human adversaries but also the courage to face the nightmarish creatures lurking within the bunkers.

Thus, players must navigate not only the perilous territories controlled by hostile gangs but also the eerie depths of bunkers where the mutated entities dwell. The dual threats add layers of challenge and unpredictability to the quest for survival in the wake of the HNN-12 disaster.


Project Down offers an exhilarating Co-op experience, allowing teams of up to four players to join forces and face the challenges of the island together. In this epic survival adventure, players will embark on exploration with their customized equipment, navigating the open world and confronting the dangers that lie ahead. Harsh weather conditions, enemy gangs, and mutated creatures will test the resilience of your team.



In Project Down, players have the opportunity to craft their own safe houses within the unforgiving landscape of the island. The build system empowers players to design and construct personalized safe houses, allowing them to shape their environment and fortify against the dangers that lurk outside.
